title: Lizard Skins DSP V2 bar tape fattens up with new 4.6mm thickness in four colors
content:
Lizard Skins DSP V2 bar tape has been updated to be more durable. And now with the new 4.6mm option, you can add thicker and more comfortable to that list as well. After starting with a single 2.4mm thickness, Lizard Skins later expanded the line to include 1.8 and 3.2mm thickness for those who wanted [â€¦]

The post Lizard Skins DSP V2 bar tape fattens up with new 4.6mm thickness in four colors appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
